root.name: Touch My Katamari
root.description: A new game in the Katamari Damacy franchise. It is planned to be a launch title for the Japanese release of the PlayStation Vita under the name "Katamari Damacy No-Vita", and as "Touch My Katamari" for the American Vita launch. The moniker No-Vita is a play on words, using the name of the console and the Japanese word Nobita meaning "to lengthen or extend" which refers to the new ability The Prince has.
